title: Van Gogh and Monet Museum Protests Spark a Debate About Tactics
description: The van Gogh and Monet paintings targeted in recent climate protests were unharmed. But a debate about tactics rages.
dc:creator: Cara Buckley
media:description: Climate activists poured mashed potatoes on the protective glass shielding a Monet painting in Potsdam, Germany, on Sunday.
